humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor as 25 mm, which is equivalent to 2.5 cm. This falls within the range for T2 tumors, which are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, the maximum dimension of the invasive component of the tumor is given as 25 mm (2.5 cm). This falls within the range for T2 (>2 cm and <=5 cm). Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
